alert.note: Alert for Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 2:47AM EST until February 17 at 8:07PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Baxter affecting Harlan County. Cumberland River at Pineville affecting Bell County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Baxter. * WHEN...From this afternoon to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by this afternoon and reach a crest near 16.5 feet also this afternoon. The river will then fall below flood stage by evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 03/29/1976. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 3 PM EST.
